OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The token of the user who represents the connector in the OpenCTI platform.

CONNECTOR_SCOPE.description: The scope or type of data the connector is importing, either a MIME type or Stix Object (for information only).

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: ISO8601 Duration format starting with 'P' for Period (e.g., 'PT30M' for 30 minutes).

CONNECTOR_TYPE.description: Should always be set to EXTERNAL_IMPORT for this connector.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: Determines the verbosity of the logs.

CROWDSTRIKE_CLIENT_ID.description: CrowdStrike API client ID for authentication.

CROWDSTRIKE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: CrowdStrike API client secret for authentication.

CROWDSTRIKE_TLP.description: Default Traffic Light Protocol (TLP) marking for imported data.

CROWDSTRIKE_CREATE_OBSERVABLES.description: Whether to create observables in OpenCTI.

CROWDSTRIKE_CREATE_INDICATORS.description: Whether to create indicators in OpenCTI.

CROWDSTRIKE_SCOPES.description: Comma-separated list of scopes to enable. Available: actor, report, indicator, yara_master, snort_suricata_master.

CROWDSTRIKE_ACTOR_START_TIMESTAMP.description: Unix timestamp from which to start importing actors. BEWARE: 0 means ALL actors!

CROWDSTRIKE_REPORT_START_TIMESTAMP.description: Unix timestamp from which to start importing reports. Default is 30 days ago. BEWARE: 0 means ALL reports!

CROWDSTRIKE_REPORT_INCLUDE_TYPES.description: Comma-separated list of report types to include.

CROWDSTRIKE_REPORT_TYPE.description: OpenCTI report type for imported reports.

CROWDSTRIKE_REPORT_TARGET_INDUSTRIES.description: Comma-separated list of target industries to filter reports.

CROWDSTRIKE_REPORT_GUESS_MALWARE.description: Whether to use report tags to guess related malware.

CROWDSTRIKE_INDICATOR_START_TIMESTAMP.description: Unix timestamp from which to start importing indicators. Default is 30 days ago. BEWARE: 0 means ALL indicators!

CROWDSTRIKE_INDICATOR_EXCLUDE_TYPES.description: Comma-separated list of indicator types to exclude from import.

CROWDSTRIKE_DEFAULT_X_OPENCTI_SCORE.description: Default confidence score for entities without explicit score.

CROWDSTRIKE_INDICATOR_LOW_SCORE.description: Score assigned to indicators with low confidence labels.

CROWDSTRIKE_INDICATOR_LOW_SCORE_LABELS.description: Comma-separated list of labels indicating low confidence.

CROWDSTRIKE_INDICATOR_MEDIUM_SCORE.description: Score assigned to indicators with medium confidence labels.

CROWDSTRIKE_INDICATOR_MEDIUM_SCORE_LABEL.description: Comma-separated list of labels indicating medium confidence.

CROWDSTRIKE_INDICATOR_HIGH_SCORE.description: Score assigned to indicators with high confidence labels.

CROWDSTRIKE_INDICATOR_HIGH_SCORE_LABELS.description: Comma-separated list of labels indicating high confidence.

CROWDSTRIKE_INDICATOR_UNWANTED_LABELS.description: Comma-separated list of unwanted labels to filter out indicators. Can be used to filter low confidence indicators: 'MaliciousConfidence/Low,MaliciousConfidence/Medium'.

CROWDSTRIKE_NO_FILE_TRIGGER_IMPORT.description: Whether to trigger import without file dependencies.

CROWDSTRIKE_INTERVAL_SEC.description: Polling interval in seconds for fetching data (used when duration_period is not set).
